channel.title: How Do i Fix My iXat Error?
channel.description:
[b]hey, could you help me with an error:
if someone login to my ixat it will go to the chat all works but the chat says ''User Not Found Refresh'', of something
could, you help me please?
Edit: but if they refresh with F5, or relogin it still dont works![/b]
:rolleyes: Please Send me an message back!
- PascaliXat

item.title: How Do i Fix My iXat Error?
item.dc:creator: @PascaliXat PascaliXat
item.description:
@PascaliXat wrote:

hmm no it all work but if they login it wouldnt work they won’t go to the chat…

for me and some others it works
